mobs.desc: She's a small, wrinkled little gnome with a cheerful demeanor. She doesn't seem worried about her surroundings, but strides around with boldness.

mobs.long_desc: A monitor lizard suns itself on a rock.
mobs.desc: It's of medium length, about two and a half feet from pointed snout to tail. Its body is powerfully muscled, ending in four stubby little legs with spiky claws. It doesn't seem to move around much, preferring to bask in the sunlight, but when it does move, it does so with surprising speed.

mobs.long_desc: A mountain goat nibbles sparse vegetation.
mobs.desc: It looks a lot like a regular goat, with four spindly legs ending in cloven hooves, a sturdy body covered in short grey hair, and small horns growing from the top of its head. It's a very graceful little creature, easily moving around its harsh home.

mobs.long_desc: Guildmaster Jora Granitearm stands watch over Black Rock Lodge.
mobs.desc: The stout and sturdy Jora Granitearm is the leader of Black Rock Lodge, the Anduin branch of the Berserker Guild.  Her skin is covered in tattoos, paying homage to Bear, her spirit totem.  Like her totem, she is stalwart and hearty, even for a dwarf.

mobs.long_desc: A wild dwarf berserker guard stands before the door.
mobs.desc: This dwarf is a stalwart beast of a woman, primed to slay at a moment's notice. Years of experience and countless ravaging battles have earned her a place of honor guarding the Black Rock Lodge.  It is her duty to keep out any who might accidentally enter the guildhall - for their own safety.

An unfinished object is lying here.
A coin-studded vest rests here.

extras.text: This vest is made of black wool that's been boiled so it's almost as hard as leather.  All over its surface, it's studded with cheap nickel and bronze coins -- all sorts of different ones, from all sorts of different lands.

objects.ground: A pair of dark green boots stand here on their own.

extras.text: They are high, hard boots crafted of sturdy stagskin and dyed the very deepest and darkest of greens.  They are simple in construction, with a soft, padded sole.

objects.ground: Some dried fruit lies here in a heap.

extras.text: Various kinds of dried fruit make up a sharp-sweet smelling medley of food. Cranberries, strawberries, and citrus fruits combine in this pile.

objects.ground: A large spring bubbles and steams up in the middle of the outcropping.

extras.text: It's large enough to bathe in, and fresh, though it has a slight mineral tang. The water is very warm to the touch.

objects.ground: A small red dagger lies here.
A small white dagger lies here.
A small blue dagger lies here.
A small black dagger lies here.
A small golden dagger lies here.
A small grey dagger lies here.
A small silver dagger lies here.
A small green dagger lies here.
A small yellow dagger lies here.
A small orange dagger lies here.
A helm sporting a pair of antlers waits here.

extras.text: The first thing you notice are the antlers of a young stag proudly affixed to the top of this helm.  The base is hardened leather studded stretched over a bronze frame.  It is solid and sturdy but the finishings are rough, perhaps intentionally so, as the look evokes a charging wild creature.

objects.ground: Bone plates wrapped in leather lay in the dirt here.

extras.text: Each vambrace is made of a plate of bones lashed together over leather pads. They are secured by strips of rough leather wrapped in several layers.  Bronze buckles secure the plate to the forearm.  Bits of shell and scale decorate them, creating the look of turtle shell or dragon scale.

objects.ground: A haphazard pile of fur and rage billows in the wind.

extras.text: Sections of fur and hide stitched together in thick layers provide extra padding and strength to what is otherwise a simple leather body harness.  The many pelts billow in voluminous waves, giving the illusion of ever-growing size and mass to the wearer.  A different likeness of a wild beast embellishes each attachment point, a sign of respect to the raging spirits of the wild such a garment evokes.

objects.ground: A pair of wild fur pants wait here.

extras.text: These pants are sewn from what appears to be wolf hide.  Although not usually used for armor, the wolf spirit the fur evokes makes it ideal for berserker gear.  Reflecting the ferocity and agility of the wolf, the pants bring the wearer closer to the animal spirit.

objects.ground: Wild leather boots with bronze studs stand proudly here.

extras.text: Rough-finished and decorated with bone embellishments, these boots look like they were cobbled together from scraps.  Closer inspection however reveals meticulous craftsmanship went into the making of these boots.  They provide excellent protection and support for distance running over rough terrain.

objects.ground: A bone and bronze bracer sits in the sun.

extras.text: This bracer is made of a single tusk riveted to a section of leather.  Held in place with bronze rivets and decorated with small bronze boar images, the bracer seems more ornamental than functional.

objects.ground: A pair of bear claws rest in the dust.

extras.text: These claws are actually full leather gloves tipped with bear's claws on each finger.  The smaller size of the claws and the lack of solid joinery indicate these gloves aren't weapons themselves, but representative of bear's strength and power.

objects.ground: A helm modeled after the raging wind hangs here.

extras.text: Curling and twisting fur evokes the ferocity of the raging wind.  It is covered in symbols of strength and power in honor of the Four Winds.  A few large feathers strung from the helm flutter as the wind rushes past.

objects.ground: Vambraces dedicated to the raging storm lay here.

extras.text: This pair of vambraces made from silver white hide and steel plates connect the wearer to the spirit of the storm.  A single sigil, representative of the howling wind, is embossed in the center of the plate.

objects.ground: A harness evoking a tempest sits here.

extras.text: This odd harness is styled in honor of the great tempest, that force of overwhelming supremacy that demolishes all in its path.  It is covered with fur and fastened with winter steel, supporting its wearer with a swirling storm of howling winds and engulfing gales.

objects.ground: A pair of silvery embellished pants lay here.

extras.text: The pants are dusted with some kind of shimmering finish, giving them a luster not commonly found on leather.  Finished in a rough tribal style, they pay hommage to the raging tempest and those who seek to emulate it.

objects.ground: A pair of tribal boots stand in the corner.

extras.text: Covered in tribal glyphs and sigils of storms, these boots bear the hallmarks of dedication to the mighty tempest.  The boots appear to be merely patchworked leather held together by sinews.  However, evoking the speedy devastation of the tempest, they are surprisingly lightweight for their bulk.

objects.ground: A bracer in the shape of a jagged cloud sits here.

extras.text: This leather and steel bracer is embossed with the divine image of the tempest. Calling forth the protection of its brutal gales, this bracer cloaks its wearer in the tempests savagery.

objects.ground: A pair of gloves evoke the image of a tempest here.

extras.text: Inscribed with the symbol of the tempest on the back of each hand, these gloves make the wearer an extension of the tempests power.  Through their hands, the chaos of the tempest is unleashed.  The simple leather these gloves are made from belie the devastation they are capable of.

objects.ground: A brightly colored cloth cap with a feather in it rests here.

extras.text: This brightly colored cap is folded in the bycocket style, forming one point in the front and another in a high peak on top surrounded by an up-turned brim. A large feather plum unfurls from the side in a fun, playful manner.

objects.ground: A pair of colorful sleeves lay crumpled up on the floor.

extras.text: These simple cloth sleeves are dyed in brilliant hues and embroidered with eye-catching motifs.  They stand out strongly in a crowd, no doubt making their wearer the center of attention.

objects.ground: A colorful tunic hangs on the back of a chair.

extras.text: This tunic is made of fine linen backed by simple cotton.  It is dyed sumptuous colors and embroidered with intricate patterns.  The shoulders are secured with small gold clasps and the waist is gathered with a fine sash.  The tunic moves and flows perfectly, accentuating every movement of the body.

objects.ground: Brightly colored leggings have been laid out for a new owner.

extras.text: Bright color catches the eye while a harlequin pattern fascinates it.  These leggings are snug-fitting, ideal for movement by allowing a full range of motion.  They provide coverage of the whole lower body, wrapping at the waist and stretching down to the ankle, tucking into a boot or shoe.

objects.ground: A pair of vibrantly colored boots stand in the corner.

extras.text: These boots are fashioned from high quality leather, sturdy enough to provide protection but soft enough to be comfortable to wear for long periods of time. The soles are the thick soles of traveling shoes, the kind befitting a wandering troubadour.  Making use of vibrant dyes however, the craftsman has created a piece of gear that wonderfully combines function with aesthetic for some flare on the go.

objects.ground: A brightly colored bracelet rests on a table here.

extras.text: Semi-precious stone beads of many types strung along multiple parallel strings make for a beautiful, if not terribly fancy, bracelet.  With the large variety of colors, one might call this a "statement piece" rather than a simple accessory.

objects.ground: A pair of brightly colored gloves have fallen on the ground.

extras.text: These are quite fancy for traveling gloves!  They're made of cotton twill so they hold the vivid colors easily, but they don't keep out the cold very well They do provide a modicum of protection, but mostly they just look nice.

objects.ground: A gorgeous gold and gemstone diadem rests on a pedestal.
A set of lush golden brocade sleeves suitable for a shining star lay here.

extras.text: Hanging long and billowing, these masterfully woven sleeves ride on the breeze like clouds on the waves.  A loose pattern of roses typical of Soltan design is woven into the richly colored fabric.  Gold embroidered trim makes the perfect final touch to this rich garment.

objects.ground: A sumptuous golden brocade doublet has been carefully laid out here.

extras.text: This vest-like garment is something between a typical doublet and a corset, ideal as the bodice for a formal gown or the vest of a fancy suit.  The heavy brocade fabric provides a stiffness and stability a more traditional doublet lacks without the boning of a full corset.  A loose rose motif typical of Soltan work is woven in with lustrous threads.  It is trimmed with small pearl bangles around the bottom and top edges, accentuated with golden fasteners. Truly a masterwork garment!

objects.ground: A pair of rich golden brocade pants awaits a top star here.

extras.text: These leggings are sublime and flowing, graceful and delicate.  Every sweep of the leg, every turn of the foot perfectly accentuated, they're ideal for someone living in the limelight.  A flare at the bottom heightens the movement and the elegance even more.  They are woven with a prime symbol of high society and class - a loose representation of the Golden Rose of Solta.

objects.ground: The most exquisite golden brocade shoes you have ever seen lay here, lonely.

extras.text: Brocade is a very uncommon material for shoes because of how dirty they can get.  That makes shoes like these extraordinarily rare.  This pair of slippers is fine brocade stitched over leather for both comfort and support.  The loose woven pattern of a Soltan rose is accentuated with golden embroidery and gemstone beads.  A lavish buckle decorates the face of the shoe.  A small sensible heel adds just that extra touch of height and composure while still being possible to walk and dance in.

objects.ground: A gemstone encrusted golden bracelet sits on a dresser.

extras.text: This bracelet is actually several very thin golden rings bound together with gold wire.  It is decorated with fine rose motifs etched into the bands then embellished with fine yellow citrines and carnelians native to the region around Solta.  Reflected light glimmers in all directions like a star twinkling in the night sky.

objects.ground: A pair of gemstone-studded golden brocade gloves suitable for a star rest here.

extras.text: These fine elbow-length velvet brocade gloves are woven with golden thread in the loose rose pattern, iconic of finery from Solta.  Small beryl gems and pearls are sewn on with small gold settings, adding both weight and beauty. They're soft and supple, and lustrous in every way.  They are the perfect gift for a star of the stage.

triggers.name: Phase Armor - Start
triggers.commands: wait 2 set anti Anti-Paladin if !%actor% || !%actor.can_be_seen% peer say I can't help you if I can't see you. halt elseif !(%classes% /= %actor.class%) || (%classes% == %anti% && %actor.class% == Paladin) if %classes% /= and msend %actor% %self.name% tells you, 'Sorry, this quest is for the msend %actor% &0%classes% msend %actor% &0classes only.' else msend %actor% %self.name% tells you, 'Sorry, this quest is for the msend %actor% &0%classes% msend %actor% &0class only.' endif halt elseif %actor.level% <= 20 * (%phase% - 1) msend %actor% %self.name% tells you, 'Sorry, why don't you come back when you've msend %actor% &0gained more experience?' halt elseif %actor.quest_stage[phase_armor]% < %phase% - 1 msend %actor% %self.name% tells you, 'I don't think you're ready for my quests yet.' halt endif if %actor.quest_stage[phase_armor]% == 0 quest start phase_armor %actor.name% elseif %actor.quest_stage[phase_armor]% == %phase% - 1 quest advance phase_armor %actor.name% endif msend %actor% %self.name% tells you, 'Excellent.  I can make %hands_name%, %feet_name%, msend %actor% &0a %wrist_name%, a %head_name%, %arms_name%, %legs_name%, or a %body_name%.' wait 2 msend %actor% %self.name% tells you, 'If you want to know about how to quest for msend %actor% &0one, ask me about it and I will tell you the components you need to get for me msend %actor% &0in order to receive your reward.' wait 2 msend %actor% %self.name% tells you, 'Remember, you can ask me &6&barmor progress&0 at any msend %actor% &0time and I'll tell you what you have given me so far.' wait 2 if !%actor.inventory[299]% && !%actor.wearing[299]% msend %actor% You can also track the progress of all your quests in this journal. mload obj 299 give quest-journal %actor.name% wait 2 msend %actor% &6&b[Look]&0 at the journal for instructions on how to use it. endif

gem_vnum %head_gem% set reward_vnum %head_reward% break case %arms_armor% set is_armor 1 case %arms_gem% set exp_x 6 set armor_vnum %arms_armor% set gem_vnum %arms_gem% set reward_vnum %arms_reward% break case %legs_armor% set is_armor 1 case %legs_gem% set exp_x 8 set armor_vnum %legs_armor% set gem_vnum %legs_gem% set reward_vnum %legs_reward% break case %body_armor% set is_armor 1 case %body_gem% set exp_x 10 set armor_vnum %body_armor% set gem_vnum %body_gem% set reward_vnum %body_reward% done if %is_armor% if !%actor.quest_variable[phase_armor:%object_vnum%_armor_acquired]% quest variable phase_armor %actor.name% %object_vnum%_armor_acquired 0 end set armor_count %actor.quest_variable[phase_armor:%object_vnum%_armor_acquired]% if %armor_count% < 1 return 1 wait 1 mjunk %object.name% eval armor_count %armor_count% + 1 quest variable phase_armor %actor.name% %object_vnum%_armor_acquired %armor_count% msend %actor% %self.name% tells you, 'Hey now, what have we here!? msend %actor% &0I've been looking for this for some time. msend %actor% &0You have now given me %get.obj_shortdesc[%object_vnum%]%.' else return 0 wait 2 eye %actor.name% msend %actor% %self.name% tells you, 'Hey now, you've already given me one of these!' msend %actor% %self.name% refuses your item. halt end else if !%actor.quest_variable[phase_armor:%object_vnum%_gems_acquired]% quest variable phase_armor %actor.name% %object_vnum%_gems_acquired 0 end set gem_count %actor.quest_variable[phase_armor:%object_vnum%_gems_acquired]% if %gem_count% < 3 return 1 wait 1 mjunk %object.name% eval gem_count %gem_count% + 1 quest variable phase_armor %actor.name% %object_vnum%_gems_acquired %gem_count% msend %actor% %self.name% tells you, 'Hey, very nice.' wait 2 msend %actor% %self.name% tells you, 'It is good to see that adventurers are out conquering the realm.' wait 2 if %gem_count% == 1 msend %actor% %self.name% tells you, 'You have given me 1 %get.obj_noadesc[%object_vnum%]%.' else msend %actor% %self.name% tells you, 'You have given me %gem_count% %get.obj_pldesc[%object_vnum%]%.' end else return 0 wait 1 eye %actor.name% msend %actor% %self.name% tells you, 'Hey now, you've already given me %gem_count% of these!' msend %actor% %self.name% refuses your item. halt end end * * Check to see if the quest is complete and if the reward can be given. * if (%actor.quest_variable[phase_armor:%gem_vnum%_gems_acquired]% == 3) && (%actor.quest_variable[phase_armor:%armor_vnum%_armor_acquired]% == 1) wait 2 msend %actor% %self.name% tells you, 'Excellent work, intrepid adventurer! msend %actor% &0You have provided me with all I need to reward you with: msend %actor% &0%get.obj_shortdesc[%reward_vnum%]%!' wait 2 msend %actor% &7&bYou gain experience!&0 switch %actor.class% case Warrior case Berserker set exp 7590 break case Paladin case Anti-Paladin case Ranger set exp 7935 break case Sorcerer case Pyromancer case Cryomancer case Illusionist case Bard set exp 8280 break case Necromancer case Monk set exp 8970 break default set exp 6900 done if %phase% == 2 * eval exp (%exp% * 433) / 100 eval exp (%exp% * 608) / 100 elseif %phase% == 3 * eval exp (%exp% * 870) / 100 eval exp (%exp% * 1340) / 100 end set lap 1 while %lap% <= %exp_x% mexp %actor% %exp% eval lap %lap% + 1 done mload obj %reward_vnum% give all %actor.name% drop all msave %actor% end done

triggers.commands: wait 2 if !%actor% || !%actor.can_be_seen% peer say I can't help you if I can't see you. halt elseif !(%classes% /= %actor.class%) || (%classes% == %anti% && %actor.class% == Paladin) if %classes% /= and msend %actor% %self.name% tells you, 'Sorry, this quest is for the msend %actor% &0%classes% msend %actor% &0classes only.' else msend %actor% %self.name% tells you, 'Sorry, this quest is for the msend %actor% &0%classes% msend %actor% &0class only.' endif halt elseif %actor.level% <= 20 * (%phase% - 1) msend %actor% %self.name% tells you, 'Sorry, why don't you %actor.quest_variable[phase_armor:%body_armor%_armor_acquired]% set hands_count %actor.quest_variable[phase_armor:%hands_gem%_gems_acquired]% set feet_count %actor.quest_variable[phase_armor:%feet_gem%_gems_acquired]% set wrist_count %actor.quest_variable[phase_armor:%wrist_gem%_gems_acquired]% set head_count == 3 eval done_legs %got_legs% == 1 && %legs_count% == 3 eval done_body %got_body% == 1 && %body_count% == 3 eval given %got_hands% + %got_feet% + %got_wrist% + %got_head% + %got_arms% + %got_legs% + (%got_legs% + %legs_count% != 4) + (%got_body% + %body_count% != 4) msend %actor% %self.name% tells you, 'Look for treasures from creatures: if %phase% == 1 msend %actor% &6&bbelow level 20&0.'&_ elseif %phase% == 2 msend %actor% &6&blevel 20 to 40&0.'&_ elseif %phase% == 3 msend %actor% &6&blevel 40 to 70&0.'&_ endif if !%given% msend %actor% %self.name% tells you, 'You haven't given me triggers.name: Phase Armor - Where
triggers.commands: set anti Anti-Paladin set max_phase 3 if !%actor% || !%actor.can_be_seen% peer say I can't help you if I can't see you. halt elseif !(%classes% /= %actor.class%) || (%classes% == %anti% && %actor.class% == Paladin) if %classes% /= and msend %actor% %self.name% tells you, 'Sorry, this quest is for the %classes% classes only.' else msend %actor% %self.name% tells you, 'Sorry, this quest is for the %classes% class only.' endif halt elseif %actor.level% <= 20 * (%phase% - 1) msend %actor% %self.name% tells you, 'Sorry, why don't you come back when you've gained more experience?' halt elseif %actor.quest_stage[phase_armor]% < %phase% - 1 msend %actor% %self.name% tells you, 'I don't think you're ready for my quests yet.' halt endif eval low_level (%phase% - 1) * 20 + 1 eval high_level %phase% * 20 wait 2 msend %actor% %self.name% tells you, 'You can find the items I seek by playing and adventuring in areas appropriate to your level.' msend %actor% %self.name% tells you, 'My quests are for those from level %low_level% to %high_level%, so the items I desire can be found in areas of that difficulty.' if %phase% < %max_phase% msend %actor% %self.name% tells you, 'Once you have agreed to take on my quests you can seek another like me for tasks a bit more difficult.' endif

triggers.name: Guild Master refuse

rooms.name: Black Rock Path
rooms.description: A wide path made of crushed black stone winds south from the gate.  Off in the distance you can see an old oak tree rocking softly in the wind.  The path leads south from here.  To the east is the safety of city walls.  A huge rock colosseum stands to the north.

rooms.name: Black Rock Path
rooms.description: This path, made of crushed black rock, leads north and south from here.  To the south a ways you can see an old oak tree.  It appears as if its leaves are black, instead of the usual green.  Something about that tree sends a shiver down your spine.

rooms.name: Black Rock Path
rooms.description: You can tightly squeeze through the surrounding rock.  This place is desolate and dry and it seems to grow colder.  A fierce wind blows all about you almost pinning you against the rocks around you.  The path is difficult to determine, just loose rock between the walls of the mountainside.

rooms.description: You can tightly squeeze through the surrounding rock.  This place is desolate and dry and it seems to grow colder.  A fierce wind blows all about you almost pinning you against the rocks around you.  The path is difficult to determine, just loose rock between the walls of the mountainside.

rooms.name: A Steaming Hot Spring
rooms.description: A natural pocket in the side of the rocky outcropping forms a dramatic backdrop to the large, circular spring in the middle of it.  The black stone of the gorge's walls is the perfect foil for the steam gently rising off of the spring. The trail is visible to the north.

rooms.name: Black Rock Path
rooms.description: The path bends again here, leading both west and south.  To the southwest the giant oak tree looms.  For a brief second you think you hear a voice calling your name.  Then you realize it is only the wind rustling through the leaves...

rooms.name: Black Rock Path
rooms.description: The path of crushed black rock leads north and south, passing by the great oak, which lies to the west.  You find yourself looking down at the black rocks of the path, so as to avert your gaze from the tree.  Mixed in with the black rocks of the path you notice something white.  It appears to be a fragment of a bone....

rooms.name: Black Rock Path
rooms.description: The path bends here leading both north and west.  Off to the west a short distance away you can see some sort of dwelling.  From here it looks rather ill kept, maybe even crumbling.

rooms.name: Black Rock Path
rooms.description: The black rock path leads east to west.  To the north the eerie oak trees sways in the wind.  Out of the rustling of the leaves you hear a sickly voice calling your name...

rooms.name: Giant Oak Tree
rooms.description: Before you stands a huge oak tree.  The leaves of this tree are black, instead of the usual green, and appear to be covered with some sort of gooey substance.  The bark of the tree appears cracked in many places and a thick black substance oozes out from it.  The sight of the tree sends shivers down your spine.

rooms.name: Black Rock Path
rooms.description: A ways to the west you can see a small dwelling of some sort.  It appears to be crumbling in places and entirely without a roof.  For a moment you get the feeling that someone is watching you.  Turning around all you can see is the oak tree swaying in the wind.

rooms.name: Black Rock Path
rooms.description: To the south an old building made of roughly cut stone stands.  The path leads to the east and west from here.  The building is dark and crumbling in places.

rooms.name: Black Rock Path
rooms.description: The black rock path bends here leading to the south and east.  To the south the crumbling building stands dark and foreboding.  A strange scratching sound can be heard coming from inside the building.  To the west is a thick hedge, blocking passage beyond it.

West.description: A tall hedge runs alongside the path.  There seem to be a few worn branches right about here.

rooms.name: Black Rock Path
rooms.description: The black rock path passes by the door to an old building, which is located to the east.  The old wooden door hangs crazily on one hinge.  The path continues off to the north and south, and from the inside the building to the east you can hear a strange scratching sound.

rooms.name: Black Rock Path
rooms.description: The path passes by the lower section of the house.  A small window offers you a view inside.  Inside the house you can see broken furniture strewn about a bare earthen floor.  The path continues to the north and south.

rooms.name: Black Rock Path
rooms.description: The path bends here leading to the north and east.  A ways down the path to the south you can see what looks like some sort of old graveyard.  A tight crevice can be noticed with a steep climb going upward, it looks like a dangerous climb.  A chilly wind blows across you from the south sending a shiver down your spine.

rooms.name: Black Rock Path
rooms.description: The path bends again, leading west and south from here.  The old building is to the north and again you get the feeling that someone is watching you. Turning around all you see is the old crumbling building.  Maybe it was just your imagination.

rooms.name: Black Rock Path
rooms.description: The black rock path ends a dark and forboding cemetery that opens up to the south.  It probably would be wise to return back along the path to the north. You can only wonder what horrors lie before you to the south...

rooms.name: Crumbling Building (entrance)
rooms.description: You step into the darkness of this old crumbling building.  The wooden roof as long since crumbled into the piles of broken wood that line the bare earthen floor.  Parts of the walls have begun to crumble as well.  A shiver runs down your spine as you wonder what hideous deeds were done in the building.

rooms.name: Crumbling Building
rooms.description: The eastern wall of the building has almost totally collapsed.  Broken bits of furniture lies strewn about the bare earthen floor in piles.  You can only wonder what this hideous building was once used for.

rooms.name: Black Rock Path
rooms.description: Before you to the south the giant oak tree towers.  Its leaves are a sickly black color.  The path bends here, perhaps to avoid the tree, leading both north and east.

To the north there appears to be a cut tunnel through the side of the mountain.  The Black Rock Path continues leading up as well as to the south.

rooms.name: Black Rock Path
rooms.description: You can tightly squeeze through the surrounding rock.  This place is desolate and dry and it seems to grow colder.  A fierce wind blows all about you almost pinning you against the rocks around you.  The path is difficult to determine, but you find a huge temple entrance carved into the granite of the cliff wall.  The statues are elaborate and horrific and depict magical people seeminginly undead and in a trance.  The smell coming from the temple reeks of rotting flesh and you wonder if you should proceed inward.  The temple entrance leads south into the crevice wall.

rooms.name: The Entrance to Black Rock Lodge
rooms.description: A great monument to battle looms large over the Black Rock Trail.  Placed just outside the gates of the City of Anduin, the lodge is both a testament to and a rebellion against the trappings of civilization.  The Lodge seems to grow out of the trail itself, being made from the same black stone as the path leading to it.  The Lodge is fitted with a single massive wooden front door.

rooms.name: Black Rock Lodge
rooms.description: Black Rock Lodge is home to the Anduin branch of the Berserker Guild.  It has been kept for generations by the dwarves who live in the surrounding hills. Open to the sky above and exposing the dirt below, Black Rock Lodge is more a colosseum than a hunting lodge.  Battle pits dot the Lodge floor and hefty iron portcullises bar entry to or from the Lodge's deeper recesses.
